BCBA-Board Certified Behavior Analyst
BCBA LBA

Technology Enhanced Learning and Living (TELL Therapy), a woman clinician-owned therapy center in central Austin, was created in response to the needs of adults with disabilities in Central Texas.

This unique position offers the opportunity to work approximately 30 hours per week, 10 hours with each of 3 clients in the south Austin area. This is an intense, in-person intervention, ideal for the skilled therapist but with ample training for those without previous adult experience.

An innovator from its inception, TELL's mission is driven by its belief in equality in access for all individuals with disabilities, regardless of age. Our behavior professionals are experts in their fields, working collaboratively to support and learn from each other and bring our clients the highest level of therapeutic services.

*Reimbursable activities are based on information from the Texas Health and Human Services Commission (HHSC).

Develop and Implement Behavior Support Plans (70%)

* meet with clients, family members and their support staff

* analyze data to determine when, where and the function of problem behaviors

* define behaviors in measurable terms... both those to reduce and replacement behaviors to increase .. and develop measurement/tracking tools

* develop and provide specialized positive behavioral interventions

* develop and demonstrate successful strategies to integrate the behavior support plan into home and community settings

Training (20%)

* meet with parents, attendants, center support staff and others in our client's lives to provide them with the skills necessary to build fluency in the implementation of the BSP

* work with each client's team to design and cross-train in BSP and crisis intervention strategies

* participate in scheduled staffing or other meetings

Organize and Maintain Records (10%)

* maintain up to date client files

* write and submit timely notes and other documents

1 currently licensed or certified as a BCBA or LBA

2 able to communicate effectively in person and in writing

CPR required when hired.

A flexible schedule
